name: Healthy & Delicious: Marinated Mushroom Salad
description: Thanks to sky-high humidity and temperatures in the triple digits, we're attempting a No-Cook month on my primary blog. So far, perhaps unsurprisingly given their reliance on produce, the best recipe ideas have come from vegans.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups cherry or grape tomatoes, halved

recipeInstructions.text: In a large serving bowl, combine olive oil, vinegar, mustard, oregano, salt, and pepper. Whisk together.
Add mushrooms, tomatoes, olives, and parsley. Stir to combine.
Let sit a few minutes on the counter. Stir again.
Store in the fridge for at least 2 hours. Stir again before serving. Serve cold or at room temperature.
